permissions: User can delete site events if SiteEventPolicy allows: admin, manager member of the developer on the job production plan, job production plan inspector, or user with update permission on the related tender job schedule shift; the record must also be user-sourced to be deletable.
side_effects: Deletes the site event record if it is eligible for deletion.
validation_notes: Argument <id> is required. --confirm must be provided. Server blocks deletion when the site event is not user-sourced.
